items.Question: How's the weather today?
items.Answer: Sample response: it is a nice sunny day

items.Question: Is it raining outside?
items.Answer: Sample response: No it is not raining right now

items.Question: How do you like the weather today?
items.Answer: Sample response: It is too cold for me!

items.Question: How did you come here today?
items.Answer: Sample response: I took the bus

items.Question: Did it take you very long to get here?
items.Answer: Sample response: Yes, it took me two hours

items.Question: Did it take you long to find a parking spot?
items.Answer: Sample response: No, I found a parking spot pretty quickly

items.Question: Did you have any problems getting here?
items.Answer: Sample response: Yes, I took the wrong turn a couple of times

items.Question: How was the traffic?
items.Answer: Sample response: It was flowing nicely

items.Question: Did you come by bus or by car?
items.Answer: Sample response: I came by bus

items.Question: Have you been waiting a long time to talk to me today?
items.Answer: Sample response: I have been waiting for 30 minutes

items.Question: How was your week-end?
items.Answer: Sample response: My week-end was great, I spent a lot of time with my family

items.Question: How are you?
items.Answer: Sample response: I am doing great, thank you! And you?

items.Question: Did you study for the citizenship test?
items.Answer: Sample response: Yes, I studied every day for the past month

items.Question: Do you feel well prepared for your test today?
Do you have any questions?
items.Answer: Sample response: Yes, I was wondering how long is the interview?

items.Question: Do you have plans for the week-end?
items.Answer: Sample response: Yes, I plan to go out to the movies with my friend
